text:
Had a very productive conversation with a MAGA gun guy today who asked
 “Are you even ALLOWED to say Merry Christmas anymore?!”
“Well... I literally just did.”
“Yeah, but I didnt know if you were ALLOWED”
“I guess I can ask my mom?”
 then dead silence until he left.
